application.doc: Delete a selection of CORS Policies

method.name: PUT
method.id: Delete a selection of CORS Policies
method.doc: To delete a selection of CORS Policies with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP PUT command on the CORS Policy resource URI.
Note that deleting a CORS Policy will result in the policy being removed from the Reverse Proxy configuration file of all instances which are currently using the policy.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: command
param.doc: The command to run. This should be set to DELETE to delete a selection of policies.

param.name: policies
param.doc: The list of policies to delete.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
